    Military buildings interface

    • Method Detail

      • createTroop

        void createTroop(Player owner,
                 java.lang.String soldierString)
          throws TroopNotBuildException
        Create a troop in this territory if it is possible
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the troop created
        soldierString - String of the soldier created type
        Throws:
        TroopNotBuildException - The troop could not be created

      • checkTroop

        Troop checkTroop()
        Check if the troop is in construction. If this occurs, continue the construction
        Returns:
        Return the troop created if this occurs, null otherwise

      • haveTroopInConstruction

        Check if a troop are building
        Returns:
        If a troop are building
